title: Three AFK's in 6 games [Need harsher penalties]
body:
It is too easy for people to get away with going afk. People go afk without caring about the consequences which most of the time is nothing. AFK's should be punished more. That way my adc's have to stay and play out the game if the surrender vote doesn't pass. I'm talking a two hour penalty or something. Maybe even more drastic, like losing all LP in your division. Something that keeps people in the game so the ones who don't quit aren't left trying to carry a 4v5.

UPDATE: Just had another two team mates go AFK in the same game. That's 5/8 people. This needs to stop.

replies.body:
There has to be a balance between over-punishing "innocent" players (who have DCs or real life emergencies) and punishing those who are AFKing abusively (i.e. intentionally and without "valid" reason).

Keep in mind that it's highly likely these players are not "habitual" AFKers, and that it's very hard if not impossible for an automatic system to distinguish intentional from unintentional AFK. Even humans are not able to judge that with accuracy in all but the most obvious cases - which do get punished.
Can you explain 5 AFK's in 8 games? Cuz it seems to be pretty habitual.

These numbers you are saying, in the language of statistics, translates to "give it a rest". You're focusing too much on an unfortunate chain of games.

Rujitra hits it on the head otherwise.

If this system pass and becomes reality i really want your internet to fall down a couple of times or something else happens and you get banned for these things. Later you will come here and blame the system xD ... Leaving system is good enough.

I would GLADLY take the punishment if it meant less AFK's. I would give all my LP for this to be in place.  I JUST had a game with two AFK team mates. Jg went 1/9 and Thresh had to use the bathroom. I would GLADLY be subject to the same punishment as those who just leave games.

I just had two more AFK's in one game as well. So, I'm pretty fed up with it.
Dude i checked your last game. Thats completly YOU problem. None was afk. And you havent done better than your team at any point in order to blame them for their stats :X just stop spreating lies...

You're right. It's hard to see it. But I was up 7/1 and then the fed bot lane came to mid and I had to deal with it. Then my team mates went afk. Watch the game and you'll see.

And... I still stand by what I said. It's totally natural to be upset by the gross amount of AFK's. If you experienced this as well, you'd be upset. There's no denying my team went AFK. You can see it in the replays. So yes, MUCH harsher penalties. It doesn't matter even if the team is doing poorly, it is bad sportsmanship to AFK. Srsly, need much much much harsher penalties.
